title: Napoli 3-0 Empoli: McTominay and Lukaku close the gap on Inter
description: Scott McTominay and Romelu Lukaku led Napoli’s charge as Antonio Conte’s team dispatched relegation-threatened Empoli 3-0 to close in on Inter in the Serie A title race. Inter beat Cagliari 3-1 on Saturday to extend their lead at the top to six points, but Napoli closed that gap back to three with a dominant victory […] The post Napoli 3-0 Empoli: McTominay and Lukaku close the gap on Inter appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Atletico Madrid 4-2 Real Valladolid: Alvarez scores two penalties as Simeone´s side rally for victor
description: Julian Alvarez scored two penalties as Atletico Madrid came from behind to beat bottom side Real Valladolid 4-2 at Riyadh Air Metropolitano. Giuliano Simeone and Alexander Sorloth were also on target for Diego Simeone’s side, who moved back within three points of second-place Real Madrid, and seven of LaLiga leaders Barcelona.
